item.title: AWS Lambda: Cold Start Duration per Language
item.description: The following chart shows the typical range of cold starts in AWS Lambda, broken down per language. The darker ranges are the most common 67% of durations, and lighter ranges include 95%.

item.title: Google Cloud Functions: Cold Start Duration per Language
item.description: The following chart shows the typical range of cold starts in Google Cloud Functions, broken down per language. The darker ranges are the most common 67% of durations, and lighter ranges include 95%.
